meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the different fucoses found in seaweed.
meanings.sent2: The lab report mentioned the presence of fucoses in the sample.
meanings.sent3: The fucoses in the ocean seemed to dance under the microscope.
meanings.sent4: Her love for marine biology was as abundant as the fucoses in the sea.
meanings.sent5: The colorful fucoses sparkled like tiny gems in the water.

meanings.definition: Fucoses: third person singular present of fucose
meanings.sent1: He fucoses the solution carefully to ensure proper mixing.
meanings.sent2: The machine fucoses the ingredients automatically in the process.
meanings.sent3: The way he fucoses the data is both precise and efficient.
meanings.sent4: Her attention to detail fucoses her work ethic in the office.
meanings.sent5: The artist fucoses on every stroke to create a masterpiece.
